data_table.description: Subject ID, ethnicity, erectile dysfunction, prostatic rectal bleeding, AUASS score before and after radiotherapy, prostate resection, age at time of radiotherapy, radiotherapy type, anti-androgen therapy, prostate tumor stage, Gleason score, PSA, CT scan, radiation dose, smoking, diabetes, and hypertension status, and use of alpha-blocker drugs among participants with or without prostate cancer and involved in the "Genetic Predictors of Adverse Radiotherapy Effects (Gene-PARE)" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified subject ID

variable.name: ED
variable.description: Erectile dysfunction

variable.name: proctitis
variable.description: Proctitis/rectal bleeding

variable.name: IPSS.delta.y1
variable.description: Change in AUASS score from baseline recorded between 1 and 2 years following radiotherapy

variable.name: IPSS.delta.y2
variable.description: Change in AUASS score from baseline recorded between 2 and 3 years following radiotherapy

variable.name: IPSS.delta.y3
variable.description: Change in AUASS score from baseline recorded between 3 and 4 years following radiotherapy

variable.name: IPSS.delta.y4
variable.description: Change in AUASS score from baseline recorded between 4 and 5 years following radiotherapy

variable.name: race
variable.description: Self-reported race/ethnicity of participant [Black, Asian, Caucasian, Hispanic]

variable.name: prior.TURP
variable.description: Transurethral resection of the prostate prior to radiotherapy

variable.name: PreRT.AUASS
variable.description: Pre-radiotherapy AUASS score

variable.name: age.at.Rx
variable.description: Subject age at time of radiotherapy

variable.name: hormones
variable.description: Anti-androgen therapy given before, during and/or after radiotherapy

variable.name: treatment
variable.description: Radiotherapy type (external beam radiotherapy, EBRT; brachytherapy) [EBRT, Brachytherapy, EBRT and Brachytherapy]

variable.name: stage
variable.description: Prostate tumor stage [T1a, T1b, T1c, T2a, T2b, T2c, T3a, T3b, T3c, Recurrence]

variable.name: gleason.score
variable.description: Gleason score of prostate tumor

variable.name: initial.PSA
variable.description: Blood concentration of prostate specific antigen (PSA)

variable.name: prostatectomy
variable.description: Radical prostatectomy prior to radiotherapy

variable.name: CT.Volume
variable.description: Prostate volume on CT scan prior to radiotherapy

variable.name: Total.BED
variable.description: Total biologically effective dose, combining EBRT and implant dose when both treatments were used, calculated using an

variable.name: EBRT.Dose
variable.description: Radiation dose delivered from external beam radiotherapy

variable.name: smoker
variable.description: Smoking status at the time of radiotherapy

variable.name: diabetes
variable.description: Diabetes status at the time of radiotherapy

variable.name: hypertension
variable.description: Hypertension status at the time of radiotherapy

variable.name: alpha.blockers
variable.description: Use of alpha-blocker drugs during treatment or follow-up
